description: Provides details about how an DataSync transfer location for a Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) is configured.

parameters.name: LocationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the HDFS location.

nested_items.name: LocationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the HDFS location.

nested_items.name: LocationUri
nested_items.description: The URI of the HDFS location.

nested_items.name: NameNodes
nested_items.description: The NameNode that manages the HDFS namespace.

nested_items.name: Hostname
nested_items.description: The hostname of the NameNode in the HDFS cluster. This value is the IP address or Domain Name Service (DNS) name of the NameNode. An agent that's installed on-premises uses this hostname to communicate with the NameNode in the network.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The port that the NameNode uses to listen to client requests.

nested_items.name: BlockSize
nested_items.description: The size of the data blocks to write into the HDFS cluster.

nested_items.name: ReplicationFactor
nested_items.description: The number of DataNodes to replicate the data to when writing to the HDFS cluster.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyProviderUri
nested_items.description: The URI of the HDFS cluster's Key Management Server (KMS).

nested_items.name: QopConfiguration
nested_items.description: The Quality of Protection (QOP) configuration, which specifies the Remote Procedure Call (RPC) and data transfer protection settings configured on the HDFS cluster.

nested_items.name: RpcProtection
nested_items.description: The RPC protection setting configured on the HDFS cluster. This setting corresponds to your hadoop.rpc.protection setting in your core-site.xml file on your Hadoop cluster.

nested_items.name: DataTransferProtection
nested_items.description: The data transfer protection setting configured on the HDFS cluster. This setting corresponds to your dfs.data.transfer.protection setting in the hdfs-site.xml file on your Hadoop cluster.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationType
nested_items.description: The type of authentication used to determine the identity of the user.

nested_items.name: SimpleUser
nested_items.description: The user name to identify the client on the host operating system. This parameter is used if the AuthenticationType is defined as SIMPLE.

nested_items.name: KerberosPrincipal
nested_items.description: The Kerberos principal with access to the files and folders on the HDFS cluster. This parameter is used if the AuthenticationType is defined as KERBEROS.

nested_items.name: AgentArns
nested_items.description: The ARNs of the DataSync agents that can connect with your HDFS cluster.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the HDFS location was created.
